text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump “Trump is doing everything he can to stop Americans from getting coronavirus tests, and lying about it, because he wants to artificially deflate a number he thinks makes him look bad. His every instinct is to lie and cheat.” 
(A. Marcotte) 🖕🏼 #FakePresident
